content: अनुयायिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [<ls>P. III. 2. 78</ls>] {@--1@} Following; attending, consequent. {@--2@} Like, similar. {@--3@} Following a principal person as a teacher (मुख्यस्य अनुगंता शिशुः). {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} A follower (<ab>lit.</ab> & <ab>fig.</ab>); रामानुजानुयायिनः followers of the doctrines of <ls>R.</ls>; a dependent or attendant; न्यषेधि शेषोऽप्यनुयायिवर्गः <ls>R. 2. 4</ls>, <ls n="R. 2.">19.</ls>
